article_title: Ithaca College President to Step Down Amid Racial Protests
article_text:
Ithaca College President Thomas Rochon announced Thursday he will step down in 2017, the latest top administrator of a U.S. college to depart amid controversy over his handling of racially charged protests.

Mr. Rochon has been heavily criticized on campus for his handling of complaints about the racial climate on campus. His decision to step down...
